TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed OdbcConnectionStringBuilder extends System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder
Public NotInheritable Class OdbcConnectionStringBuilder Inherits DbConnectionStringBuilder

summary.span: 提供簡單的方法，以建立和管理 類別使用之連接字串的內容。

span.span: Provides a simple way to create and manage the contents of connection strings used by the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 連接字串產生器可讓開發人員以程式設計方式建立語法正確的連接字串，以及剖析和重建現有的連接字串，使用屬性和類別的方法。The connection string builders let developers programmatically create syntactically correct connection strings, and parse and rebuild existing connection strings, using properties and methods of the class. 連接字串產生器提供強型別屬性對應到已知索引鍵/值組允許的 ODBC 連接和開發人員可以加入任何其他連接字串值的任意索引鍵/值組。The connection string builder provides strongly typed properties corresponding to the known key/value pairs allowed by ODBC connections, and developers can add arbitrary key/value pairs for any other connection string values. 必須建立連接字串做為應用程式一部分的開發人員可以使用 類別來建置及修改連接字串。Developers needing to create connection strings as part of applications can use the class to build and modify connection strings. 此類別也可讓您輕鬆管理儲存在應用程式組態檔內的連接字串。The class also makes it easy to manage connection strings stored in an application configuration file. 只執行一組有限的已知索引鍵/值組的檢查。 performs checks only for the limited set of known key/value pairs. 因此，這個類別可以用來建立無效的連接字串。Therefore, this class can be used to create invalid connection strings. 下表列出特定已知的索引鍵，以及其對應的屬性內類別和其預設值。The following table lists the specific known keys together with their corresponding properties within the class, and their default values. 除了這些特定值時，開發人員也可以加入的任何索引鍵/值組集合內所包含執行個體。Besides these specific values, developers can add any key/value pairs to the collection that is contained within the instance. |KeyKey|屬性Property|註解Comment|預設值Default value| |---------|--------------|-------------|-------------------| |驅動器Driver||開發人員不應包含大括號周圍的驅動程式名稱，當您設定這些屬性屬性。Developers should not include the braces surrounding the driver name when they set the property. 執行個體將視需要增加大括號。The instance adds braces as needed.|空字串Empty string| |DSNDSN|||空字串Empty string| 如果有任何值 (以外值) 內的連接字串包含分號 （;）、周圍加上引號的連接字串中的值。If any value (other than the value) within the connection string contains a semicolon (;), the surrounds the value with quotation marks in the connection string. 若要避免這個問題的經常包含分號，值類別一律會括住這個值以括號。In order to avoid this issue with the value that frequently contains a semicolon, the class always surrounds this value with braces. ODBC 規格表示必須以括號，括住包含分號的驅動程式值，這個類別會為您處理這。The ODBC specification indicates that driver values that contain semicolons must be surrounded with braces, and this class handles this for you. 屬性控制代碼嘗試插入惡意程式碼。The property handles attempts to insert malicious code. 例如，下列程式碼，使用預設屬性 （C# 中為索引子） 正確逸出巢狀索引鍵/值組。For example, the following code, using the default property (the indexer, in C#) correctly escapes the nested key/value pair. ```vb Dim builder As _ New System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnectionStringBuilder ' Take advantage of the Driver property. builder.Driver = "SQL Server" builder("Server") = "MyServer;NewValue=Bad" Console.WriteLine(builder.ConnectionString) ``` ```csharp System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnectionStringBuilder builder = new System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnectionStringBuilder(); // Take advantage of the Driver property. builder.Driver = "SQL Server"; builder["Server"] = "MyServer;NewValue=Bad"; Console.WriteLine(builder.ConnectionString); ``` 結果是以安全方式處理無效值的下列連接字串：The result is the following connection string that handles the invalid value in a safe manner: ``` Driver={SQL Server};Server="MyServer;NewValue=Bad" ``` ## Examples 下列主控台應用程式會建立數個 ODBC 資料庫連接字串。The following console application builds connection strings for several ODBC databases. 首先，範例會建立 Microsoft Access 資料庫的連接字串。First, the example creates a connection string for a Microsoft Access database. 然後，它會建立 IBM DB2 資料庫的連接字串。It then creates a connection string for an IBM DB2 database. 此範例也會剖析現有的連接字串，並示範操作連接字串的內容的各種方式。The example also parses an existing connection string, and demonstrates various ways of manipulating the contents of the connection string. > [!NOTE] > 這個範例包含了密碼，可示範 如何搭配連接字串使用。This example includes a password to demonstrate how works with connection strings. 我們建議在您的應用程式中使用 Windows 驗證。In your applications, we recommend that you use Windows Authentication. 如果您必須使用密碼，請勿在您的應用程式中包含硬式編碼的密碼。If you must use a password, do not include a hard-coded password in your application. [!code-csharp[DataWorks OdbcConnectionStringBuilder#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks OdbcConnectionStringBuilder/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks OdbcConnectionStringBuilder#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks OdbcConnectionStringBuilder/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

summary.span: 所提供的連接字串會提供執行個體內部連接資訊的資料。

span.span: The provided connection string provides the data for the instance's internal connection information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以將連接字串中建構函式，或您可以設定屬性明確。You can pass a connection string in the constructor, or you can set the property explicitly. 行為是相同的兩種。The behavior is the same either way. ## Examples 下列範例會建立多個執行個體，將不同的連接字串傳遞至每個案例的建構函式。The following example creates multiple instances, passing a different connection string to the constructor in each case. 請注意，在連接字串內的項目順序可能會修改當您擷取時屬性。Note that the ordering of elements within the connection string may be modified when you retrieve the property. 也請注意，索引鍵的預先定義的 「 資料來源名稱 」 和 「 驅動程式 」 索引鍵轉換成小寫的類別。Also note that keys other than the predefined "Dsn" and "Driver" keys are converted to lowercase by the class. > [!NOTE] > 這個範例包含了密碼，可示範 如何搭配連接字串使用。This example includes a password to demonstrate how works with connection strings. 我們建議在您的應用程式中使用 Windows 驗證。In your applications, we recommend that you use Windows Authentication. 如果您必須使用密碼，請勿在您的應用程式中包含硬式編碼的密碼。If you must use a password, do not include a hard-coded password in your application. [!code-csharp[DataWorks OdbcConnectionStringBuilder.Multiple#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks OdbcConnectionStringBuilder.Multiple/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks OdbcConnectionStringBuilder.Multiple#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks OdbcConnectionStringBuilder.Multiple/VB/source.vb#1)]

exception.span: 連接字串的格式錯誤 (也許在索引鍵/值組中遺漏了必要的 "=")。

span.span: The connection string is incorrectly formatted (perhaps missing the required "=" within a key/value pair).

summary.span: 清除 執行個體的內容。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會移除所有索引鍵/值配對並重設和成為其預設值的屬性。The method removes all key/value pairs from the and resets the and properties to their default values. 方法也會設定屬性設為 0 和屬性設為空字串。The method also sets the property to 0 and the property to an empty string. ## Examples [!code-csharp[DataWorks OdbcConnectionStringBuilder.Clear#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks OdbcConnectionStringBuilder.Clear/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks OdbcConnectionStringBuilder.Clear#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks OdbcConnectionStringBuilder.Clear/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Driver { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定與連接相關聯的 ODBC 驅動程式名稱。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the ODBC driver associated with the connection.

value.span: 屬性的值，或如未提供任何值，則為 。

span.span: The value of the property, or if none has been supplied.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果當您嘗試設定此屬性時，傳入的值為 null，則會重設 屬性。If the value passed in is null when you try to set the property, the property is reset. 如果未設定值，而且開發人員嘗試用來擷取屬性，則傳回值是`String.Empty`。If the value has not been set and the developer tries to retrieve the property, the return value is `String.Empty`. 此屬性會對應至連接字串內的 「 驅動程式 」 索引鍵。This property corresponds to the "Driver" key within the connection string.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Dsn { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定與連接相關聯之資料來源名稱 (Data Source Name，DSN) 的名稱。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the data source name (DSN) associated with the connection.

value.span: 屬性的值，或如未提供任何值，則為 。

span.span: The value of the property, or if none has been supplied.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果當您嘗試設定此屬性時，傳入的值為 null，則會重設 屬性。If the value passed in is null when you try to set the property, the property is reset. 如果未設定值，而且開發人員嘗試用來擷取屬性，則傳回值是`String.Empty`。If the value has not been set and the developer tries to retrieve the property, the return value is `String.Empty`. 此屬性會對應至連接字串內的"Dsn"索引鍵。This property corresponds to the "Dsn" key within the connection string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您設定這個屬性，如果字典中已經存在指定的索引鍵時，就會取代值;否則，會建立新的項目。When you set this property, if the specified key already exists in the dictionary, the value is replaced; otherwise, a new element is created. ## Examples 主控台應用程式中的下列程式碼會建立新的 ，並使用 屬性將索引鍵/值組加入其連接字串。The following code, in a console application, creates a new and adds key/value pairs to its connection string, using the property. remarks.format: ## Remarks 中的值順序是關聯值中的相同順序傳回屬性。The order of the values in the is the same order as the associated values in the returned by the property. ## Examples 下列主控台應用程式範例會建立新的 。The following console application example creates a new . 此程式碼會針對 屬性傳回的 執行迴圈，以顯示索引鍵/值組。The code loops through the returned by the property displaying the key/value pairs. > [!NOTE] > 這個範例包含了密碼，可示範 如何搭配連接字串使用。This example includes a password to demonstrate how works with connection strings. 我們建議在您的應用程式中使用 Windows 驗證。In your applications, we recommend that you use Windows Authentication. 如果您必須使用密碼，請勿在您的應用程式中包含硬式編碼的密碼。If you must use a password, do not include a hard-coded password in your application. span.span: if the key existed within the connection string and was removed; if the key did not exist.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因為方法會傳回值，指出成功，不需要尋找的索引鍵是否存在，然後再嘗試移除索引鍵/值組，來自執行個體。Because the method returns a value that indicates its success, it is not required to look for the existence of a key before trying to remove the key/value pair from the instance. ## Examples 下列範例會建立執行個體，並示範的行為方法。The following example creates an instance and demonstrates the behavior of the method. [!code-csharp[DataWorks OdbcConnectionStringBuilder.Remove#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks OdbcConnectionStringBuilder.Remove/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks OdbcConnectionStringBuilder.Remove#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks OdbcConnectionStringBuilder.Remove/VB/source.vb#1)]

The value corresponding to keyword.

returns.span: 如果在連接字串中找到 ，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if was found within the connection string; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法可讓開發人員安全地從 擷取值，而不需確認提供的索引鍵名稱是有效的索引鍵名稱。The method lets developers safely retrieve a value from a without needing to verify that the supplied key name is a valid key name. 因為不會引發例外狀況傳遞時不存在的機碼中，您不必先擷取其值尋找索引鍵。Because does not raise an exception when you pass in a nonexistent key, you do not have to look for a key before retrieving its value. 呼叫具有不存在的索引鍵會將 null 值 (`Nothing`在 Visual Basic 中) 中`value`參數。Calling with a nonexistent key places the value null (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) in the `value` parameter. ## Examples 下列範例示範的行為方法。The following example demonstrates the behavior of the method. [!code-csharp[DataWorks OdbcConnectionStringBuilder.TryGetValue#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks OdbcConnectionStringBuilder.TryGetValue/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks OdbcConnectionStringBuilder.TryGetValue#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks OdbcConnectionStringBuilder.TryGetValue/VB/source.vb#1)]
